titles.title: My God How the Money Rolls In!

properties.tune: My Bonnie Lies over the Ocean
properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My cousin sells shields to the Tuchux The plywood they're made of is thin; I'm a doggone good Chiurgeon My God, how the money rolls in!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My brother is a mercenary Hiring out to help you win Since both Kingdoms pay for his wages My God, how the money rolls in!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The East and the Middle are fighting Trimaris and others join in The Dark Horde makes book on the winner My God, how the money rolls in!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Smilin' Ali is looking for people To travel a long way with him To auctions in old Persian markets My God, how the money rolls in!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I'm just a poor mercenary I don't care if we lose or we win As long as you're still here on payday My God, how the money rolls in!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Ioseph of Locksley is Celtic, Ioseph of Locksley is thin, Ioseph writes satire to order, My God, how the money rolls in!
